name: Emperowatt
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Emperowatt you can Nexus
all of your Enchanting Spirits to it. You can
Disenchant {omni}{omni}{omni} in any combination of {frost}
and/or {thunder} from this Emperowatt in order to
destroy each card on an opponent's field.
effect: When you Cast this Emperowatt you can Nexus all of your Enchanting Spirits to it. You can Disenchant {omni}{omni}{omni} in any combination of {frost}/{thunder} in order to destroy each card on an opponent's field.
